item.title: Fun and fighting at the Finborough
item.author: Jordi Brown,Nigel Fullerton,
item.description: The Finborough Theatre occupies a small room above a Kensington pub (The Finborough) and seems the most unlikely place to put on a large cast musical by the great Broadway duo Rodgers and Hammerstein. Now I’m a massive fan of the intimate theatre but a broadway musical? All I can say is that “Me and …
